data.title: Databases
data.meta_description: FIT Library provides access to a variety of databases that cover fashion design and industry, general interest, trade and scholarly publications, as well as image and visual media rich resources. Databases are accessible to current FIT students, staff, faculty, and staff.
data.text:
Many of our databases require additional login/account creation steps. Please click the Plus sign next to each listing for any further details. If you run into trouble accessing a database, please visit our FAQ and Troubleshooter page.

Please try running your browser in 'incognito' or 'private' mode, which can solve many database access issues (see this How to Use Chrome Incognito Or Firefox Private Windows for more information).

For accessibility assistance with our resources, please see the Library Accessibility page.

Please share feedback about any of our trial databases â€”we'd love to hear from you.
